name: PlayTime (Leffy21)
description:
You are the time before it flows into a single dimension. You are free to do whatever you want but for how long ?

____________________________________________________________________________________________
Alter what you want and travel where you want. You can go to the past at your left or go to the future at your right.


This is a submission to aJamAboutTime hosted by Lone Rabbit.

____________________________________________________________________________________________
To made this game I use some of assets :
- Generic old west audio, thanks to vacaroxa
- Farm tileset, thanks to shubibubi

This an rpg maker game WITHOUT random battle.
